t:
They said, “My eyes make people delusional.”



       The mirror proved them...
c:
#hallucination #eyes #mirror #proof #medusa

#eclectica20 #creativeminds #expresso6



We don't know if they're proven correct or wrong. The fact that the narrator kept the story incomplete indicates that as soon as they looked into the mirror, they became delusional. Or, did they?
The fact that I'm limited to only ten words was actually used to build this story.
